text: Daniel is an English department store chain and Royal Warrant holder, with its flagship store situated in central Windsor. It was established in 1901 by Walter James Daniel, and is privately owned. ==Department store locations== *Ealing *Chiswick *Windsor ==Former locations== *Cardiff *Ebbw Vale *Newbury *Reading *Slough ==References== ==External links== * danielstores.co.uk Category:Buildings and structures in Windsor, Berkshire Category:Department stores of the United Kingdom
title: Daniel (department store)
